metadata.title: Configure auditing of unsuccessful ownership changes

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests if contents of /etc/audit/rules.d/30-ospp-v42-6-owner-change-failed.rules is exactly what is defined in rule description

ind:textfilecontent54_state.ind:text: ## Unsuccessful ownership change -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S lchown,fchown,chown,fchownat -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=unsuccessful-owner-change -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S lchown,fchown,chown,fchownat -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=unsuccessful-owner-change -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S lchown,fchown,chown,fchownat -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=unsuccessful-owner-change -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S lchown,fchown,chown,fchownat -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=1000 -F auid!=unset -F key=unsuccessful-owner-change
